__e: Because you and I have something Martha Stewart and machines don't.
With pleasure, but Stewart and me it has something planned.
Well, I'll tell you something-- she lays one more finger on me... and I'm going to Stewart and I'm telling her everything.
Look, Miss Stewart... I don't know what to say.
I mean, when I spoke to Mrs Stewart I had a hunch that she'd tell you.
Mrs. Stewart, I know it's a lot to ask, but I'm asking.
Because this Stewart case is a big deal.
Colonel Stewart? I've no doubt he's like the rest of you.
